column2: "Oh my! Sounds like the two of you have gone through a lot."
"Xiao... You let us go knowing that this would happen, didn't you?"

"Nevertheless, the data you've
gathered in the scouting practice
will help with the translation
progress."
"The translation was progressing slowly, but thanks to you two, we've managed to gather lots of useful data."
"Fortunately, the language is established. The next time you hear it, it should automatically be translated."
"We seem to be revered by the natives. Did you manage to find out why?"
"That I don't understand. It might be due to Planet Harkotan's culture, but I'll need to look into it to be sure."
"We'll be surrounded and worshiped again during the next investigation. Now that we can understand them, I wonder what they will say."
"Isn't it better than being hated, at least? Either way, this is part of ARKS' duty too, Miss Special Exception ARKS."
